Fixed, see bug id=202154. Current bug resolve works as follows:
- for new job its updater is created before job informations are fetched ( most notably: jobId ). So hashmap connecting job's ids with their updaters is not created properly.
- for each newly submitted job there is created thread which tries to update "unknown" job id in the hashmap with right jobId. It finishes when job id is fetched.

I removed also overwork for this bug and tested.
There is no NullPointerException now.
